lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your Nov. 11 editorial ''Vietnam Ghosts'' describes Robert S. McNamara's 1995 memoir as ''casually cynical.'' Wow. I was the publisher of that book, and I can tell you that it was as heartfelt and earnest a piece of writing as I have ever encountered. To take the rap for the Vietnam War and explore the reasons it happened so that the same mistakes would not be repeated was courageous, even dangerous.
abstract: Publisher Peter Osnos letter on Nov 11 editorial denies Robert S McNamara's 1995 Vietnam War memoir was cynical; lauds McNamara's courage in taking blame for war and exploring reasons it happened
